Uses of Class
uk.ac.gate.cloud.client.RestClientException

  • Packages that use RestClientException 
    Package Description
    uk.ac.gate.cloud.client
    Generic REST client implementation based on HttpURLConnection.
    uk.ac.gate.cloud.job
    Classes related to job management.
    uk.ac.gate.cloud.shop
    Classes relating to the "shop" API for browsing available pipelines and reserving annotation jobs based on them.
